attributes.action: stop prisoners' TV licences being paid for by the taxpayer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They rob us out of prison, and we pay for their luxuries in prison, Why?

Why is it that prisoners do not pay for TV licences when MOD bases and accommodation are not exempt from TV licensing laws.   
Service families accommodation and single living accommodation must also be licensed separately.  
A home TV Licence does not cover people whilst living on base. 
The same rules apply to students in lodges, lodgers, etc.  So why are criminals let off? 
This surely sends the wrong message? Criminals should not have TVs, it is prison, if they must because of some stupid Human Rights law, then they must also pay for the licence themselves!
